admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The project is aimed at: (i) expanding
            and improving the sewerage services in Istanbul; (ii)
            improving the city environmental conditions; and (iii)
            strengthening the institutional framework for planning,
            financing and implementation of water supply and sewerage
            facilities in Istanbul. To achieve these objectives, the
            project would include the following major components: (i)
            laterals and collectors; (ii) interceptors and tunnel; (iii)
            pretreatment works with inlet and outlet pumping stations;
            (iv) submarine outfall main; (v) operating and maintenance
            equipment; (vi) consultant services; and (vii) technical
            assistance and training.
